thread.title: RUMOURS: Man Utd want £145m Atletico duo Griezmann & Saul
thread.title_full: RUMOURS: Man Utd want £145m Atletico duo Griezmann & Saul

title: RUMOURS: Man Utd want £145m Atletico duo Griezmann & Saul
text: 0 01-Jan-2017 16:10:25 Jose Mourinho's side are reportedly hoping to lure the Atleti pair to Old Trafford and are confident they can negotiate down their huge release clauses Manchester United are planning a mega double bid for Atletico Madrid stars Antoine Griezmann and Saul Niguez, according to the Times . The duo, who have developed into two of the top players in Spanish football, only signed new contracts with the Liga club in 2016 and have thus seen their release clauses rise to a combined £145 million. But Jose Mourinho is confident that United will be able to negotiate those fees down, with the Red Devils boss now reportedly targeting four or five elite players to help return the club back to the top.
